metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7553 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The buf.pl script before 2.20 in Irssi before 0.8.20 uses weak permissionsfor the scrollbuffer dump file created between upgrades, which might allowlocal users to obtain sensitive information from private chat conversationsby reading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7553` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3').
